Room.Name: Roman Iron Works
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Roman's Iron Works Shop, where you can buy some fine goods.
Room.LongDescription: The Roman Iron Works shop is dedicated to cast-iron weapons and shields that last for a while, but may not do as much dammage or protect as well. As usual, the price you pay for inexpensive goods has benifits, but also has drawbacks. The Roman Iron Works employees are more than happy to provide you with anything you might want.
